overview: For Adam Rolston and Ron Rutland, Mongolia is becoming the most adventurous golf course in the world. Together they want to hit a golf ball across the Mongolian highlands. What sounds like a modern version of Sisyphus becomes a touchstone of friendship for the two men, who could hardly be more different. But then a stray dog runs to them - can the four-legged friend become the link between the unequal duo?
title: The Longest Hole
